name: Crumby RPG
description:
Ok, so, I had an idea, and that idea was to make a game.  Ive made several before, but they were all pretty bad. 

But i was making one for a really old console a long time ago, and just this year, i started development with a bigger software, this time, I'll do everything i can to make it fun and enjoyable!

Although this is only its beta 1.1, so, its probably not gonna be finished for a long time. But i will make constant updates to this, so with each new update there will be a whole lot more to do!

I hope you all enjoy my newest project. Thanks!
